value:
$WmMPID_サイラス,ch05_42_Silas_M_Normal,Face|Legendary tea? It must be pretty
good. And that's really what we
need?$k$p$WmMPID_フローラ,ch05_41_Flora_F_Normal,Face|The Order of Heroes has treated us
well, so I would like to host a tea
party for them.$k$pAnd in order to show proper respect,
legendary tea is a must. It will be our
way of returning their hospitality.$k$pIf one drinks just a single cup of this
tea, the fatigue of the day will all but
vanish.$k$pAnd according to Commander Anna,
it grows in this remote region of Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_オフェリア,ch05_44_Ophelia_F_Normal,Face|Very well, Flora! I have heard your
story, and I can feel the devotion
flowing from your very soul.$k$pYou wish to soothe the exhausted
spirits of Askr. Your heart sparkles
with the...the...sparkles of purity!$k$pI can be quite picky, myself, when it
comes to tea. And so I, Ophelia Dusk,
shall take up your epic quest!$k$pIt is my personal mission to retrieve
this...miracle tea... Hmm, tea is kind of
amber in color, so...$k$pI shall retrieve this tea, henceforth
known as...Amberacle!$k$p$WmMPID_サイラス,ch05_42_Silas_M_Normal,Face|Right... So in other words, we're
repaying their kindness? If we can do
so outside of battle, I welcome it.$k$pAllow me to accompany you. And
perhaps Prince Alfonse can lead the
way.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You're still unfamiliar with the local
geography, so that's a good idea.$k$p$WmMPID_サイラス,ch05_42_Silas_M_Normal,Face|Excellent! We can move out at once.$k$p$WmMPID_エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_F_Normal,Face|Hmm...$k$pA knight and a prince...roaming deep
within a dark forest... The way they
help one another over a fallen tree...$k$pOh! But one of them trips! And the
other is there to break his fall. I can
see it all so clearly!$k$pI need to watch this play out without
being spotted myself... I'm merely an
observer, after all.$k$pMaybe I can hide in a barrel to spy on
their blossoming relationship...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We're heading into the mountains up
north. It's likely we'll run into trouble,
so we must proceed with caution.$k$p$WmMPID_オフェリア,ch05_44_Ophelia_F_Normal,Face|Worry not, young prince! As long as
chosen heroine Ophelia Dusk is by
your side, all foes shall perish!$k$pHrk?! The power of dusk...within me...
It's overflowing! No, Ophelia, contain
yourself...$k$pSave your dark energy for when you
can unleash it upon your enemies!$k$p$WmMPID_エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... I know this girl...and not even
the most talented staff user can heal
her delusions.$k$pI suppose it's fine... As long as her
delusions don't get in the way of my
own.$k$p$WmMPID_サイラス,ch05_42_Silas_M_Normal,Face|Well, let's move out. As Alfonse said,
it can be dangerous, so stay focused.$k$p$WmMPID_フローラ,ch05_41_Flora_F_Normal,Face|Thank you for your assistance,
everyone. We'll soon have all we
need for a world-class tea time!$k$p
